original_text: But some widows only want to enjoy themselves. For a widow like that, her spirit is already dead, even while she is still alive.

sentences.original_text: But some widows only want to enjoy themselves.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 어떤 과부들은 오직 자신을 즐기기만 원합니다.

sentences.original_text: even while she is still alive.
